text: An la yu yiselie de houyi que yi diyue, bing cong tamen zhong paichu shi'er ge shouling. An la shuo:“Wo que yu nimen tong zai. Ruguo nimen jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quexin wo de zhong shizhe, bing xiezhu tamen, bing yi shan zhai jie gei an la, wo bi gouxiao nimen de zui'e, wo bi rang nimen jinru xia lin zhu he de leyuan. Cihou, shei bu xindao, shei yi mishile zhenglu.”
